scripts.test-tasks: artillery run --output results/report-tasks.json tasks.yml && artillery report --output results/report-tasks.html results/report-tasks.json
scripts.test-projects: artillery run --output results/report-projects.json projects.yml && artillery report --output results/report-projects.html results/report-projects.json
scripts.test-all: artillery run --output results/report-projects.json projects.yml && artillery report --output results/report-projects.html results/report-projects.json; artillery run --output results/report-tasks.json tasks.yml && artillery report --output results/report-tasks.html results/report-tasks.json
